thread.title: What you can do if the price of your prescription suddenly spikes

title: What you can do if the price of your prescription suddenly spikes
text: What you can do if the price of your prescription suddenly spikes 2 Hours Ago The American Greed Report: Many patients are seeing huge price jumps in the cost of their drugs. Last year alone, prescription drug prices rose nearly six times the ate of inflation. It’s not just name-brand drug prices on the rise. For many Americans even generic drugs are being priced out of reach. But there are steps you can take to lower your costs. Scott Cohn of CNBC’S American Greed has potential life saving tips. Season Premiere American Greed February 26 | Monday 10P ET/PT
